description:
How many times have you scanned an item in a store and got the message "This item is currently not in the Amazon catalog." I used to put these items right back on the shelf until I realized that this was a gold mine.

Most people will not take the extra time that is needed to create a listing for a new product on Amazon. Those who do are given the chance to capture a whole new market of buyers through Amazon.

This course is designed to give you the basics on how to create a listing from start to finish. It includes an example of creating a listing from a product that already exists on another store's website and it also covers topics including keyword research, consumer behavior, editing photos, and Amazon search methodology.

This course is perfect for those who have never created a listing before, those who are bringing a new product to market (wholesale or private label), or those looking to expand their current inventory offerings.

If you are not satisfied with the course, please email us at gumroad@fbamaster.com and we will work with you to make things right :)

- Chris, John, and Mike (The FBA Master Crew)
title: Creating a Product Listing on Amazon
